name: RiskCube
long_description:
Our platform makes it simple for founders and teams to compare top-rated business insurance providers, buy the right coverage online in minutes, and manage policies all in one place.

Our initial focus is Directors & Officers (D&O) insurance, helping venture-backed companies secure the coverage they need quickly and transparently.

If you're a carrier interested in partnering, send us a DM.
one_liner: AI insurance broker for startups to compare and buy coverage.
